text: Jason McGerr is the drummer for the alternative rock band Death Cab for Cutie. He is also an instructor at the Seattle Drum School of Music. ==Discography== ===Death Cab for Cutie=== ;Studio albums * Transatlanicism (October 7, 2003) * Plans (August 30, 2005) * Narrow Stairs (May 13, 2008) * Codes and Keys (May 31, 2011) == References == Category:Living people Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from Washington Category:1974 births
title: Jason McGerr
